report.title: Opportunities and challenges for entrepreneurship in the education space in India

topic.title: Opportunities and challenges for entrepreneurship in the education space in India

report.title: One Day workshop on Innovation and Design Thinking

description.text: <h1>Critical Problems cannot be solved by routine thinking. With the rapid changes in technology, conventional methods used to solve problems are no longer effective. There is a need to develop new ways of thinking in order to design better solutions, services and experiences that solve our current problems. Innovation is the process of creating and implementing a new idea. It is the process of taking useful ideas and converting them into useful products; services or processes or methods of operation. These useful ideas are the result of creativity, which is the prerequisite for innovation.&nbsp;<a href="https://www.interaction-design.org/literature/topics/design-thinking">Design Thinking</a>&nbsp;steps in with a bold newly systematised and non-linear human-centred approach. This will help us radically change how we go about exploring problems and creating solutions to those problems. This workshop will aim at providing a systematic approach to Innovation and Design thinking. People from Industry, Entrepreneurs, Students and Faculty are encouraged to attend this workshop.</h1>

report.title: Workshop on Innovation and Design Thinking
Career success in IOT field & Personal Agility

report.title: “Leading at Scale - managing priorities in a complex world”

description.text: <p class="p1">Complexity is everywhere. Whether you are leading a large organization or a large project with mulitple stakeholders, managing multiple priorities and executing successfully at scale is a necessary skill in today's world. Rao Surapaneni(VP Engineering, Head of India Product Operations) will share his experience and tips on how to lead at scale.</p>

report.keywords: IEEE, TEMS, Complexity, Management, Scalability, Large Teams, India, Hyderabad

topic.title: Leading at Scale - managing priorities in a complex world
